prompt: Create a function that manage a chat via CLI. `llmove chat` should return a welcome message and it should wait for user input. The context of the chat must be all the conventions.xml and root.xml in specs. A special system prompt file specs/chat.xml may be present and used as context. Once the user send input, the conversation starts: after the AI response, the cli should wait for other user input and keep the history. Write it in lib/chat.js. use the openai sdk in order to manage stream data. this is the current api.js for sending data to claude, I think it's better to refactor it supporting also stream and using sdk
